instructions: Back up data on the internal memory. From the home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under 'Personal,' tap Backup & reset . Tap the following to set as desired: Back up my data Backup account Automatic restore Tap Factory data reset. Tap RESET TABLET . Tap ERASE EVERYTHING .
Back up data on the internal memory. From the home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under 'Personal,' tap Backup & reset . Tap Network settings reset . Tap Reset settings . Tap Reset settings .

From the Home screen, tap Messaging . Tap Menu > Settings > Emergency alerts . Enable or disable the following options: Presidential alert (set to always on and cannot be turned off) Imminent extreme alert (ON/OFF) Imminent severe alert (ON/OFF) AMBER alerts (ON/OFF) Alert sound (ON/OFF) Alert vibration (ON/OFF) Sound and/or vibration during calls (ON/OFF)

From the Home screen, tap Email . Tap Menu > Settings . Under ' ACCOUNTS & SYNC,' Tap the email account. Scroll down to NOTIFICATION settings. Select or clear the New emails slider. Tap Notification sound to update. Select or clear the Sent email sound slider.
From the Home screen, tap Settings . Tap the 'Sound' tab. Tap Ringtone . Tap to select desired ringtone, then OK .
From the Home screen, tap Contacts . Tap desired contact. Tap the edit icon. Tap More > Ringtone . Tap to select desired ringtone. Tap OK . Tap SAVE .
